title: Love Love Reversible Couple Heart Beat Anthology
alternative_title: ラブラブリバップルアンソロジー HEART BEAT
status: ラブラブリバップルアンソロジー HEART BEAT
description:
Description :
        This is a collection of oneshots created by 13 artists. 1) Night Routine - MATSUMOTO Noda 2) Koukishin wa Neko wo mo Korosu - MOTOYAMA Ako 3) Kusayakyuu Nakama Batsu Nii Yamome - Gimme 4) Hajimari wa Dou Are - HIROSATO Kana 5) Turning Point - 依田ヨクト 6) Christmas Eve no Shitsuren - Shiohigari 7) Virtual Liberty - Nikumaru 8) Surprise Switch! - ためいけ 9) Nigate na Osananajimi - IMAI Sasaru 10) Oishii Trade - Marugari 11) Konna Hazu de wa - Wakachiko 12) Outotsu Morning Love (Mismatched Morning Lovers) - TOBI Washio 13) Baka Mitai na Futari - HINO Youhe
